name: Spooncats
about: I'm Spooncats, an artist and graphic designer for this site. I started playing Duel Links to satisfy my nostalgia, and eventually found the DuelLinksMeta community. I'm not much of a competitive player, but I like to contribute what I can through being a Content Creator. (Discord: spooncats #0287)
accomplishments: Watched every Yu-Gi-Oh show (except for ARC-V), Unironically enjoyed Yu-Gi-Oh Zexal, Makes cool thumbnails for articles
